member.name: IAgileReference.Resolve
member.summary: Gets the interface ID of an agile reference to an object.
member.param: The interface ID of the interface to be retrieved from the agile reference. It is not required to be the same as the registered interface.
On successful completion, *ppvObjectReference is a pointer to the interface specified by riid.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The requested interface isn't implemented on the registered object.

member.name: IAgileReference.Resolve
member.summary: Gets the interface ID of an agile reference to an object.
member.param: The interface ID of the interface to be retrieved from the agile reference. It is not required to be the same as the registered interface.
On successful completion, *ppvObjectReference is a pointer to the interface specified by riid.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The requested interface isn't implemented on the registered object.

member.name: IAgileReference
member.summary: Enables retrieving an agile reference to an object.
